net.openhft.chronicle.core

Interface ReferenceCounted

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReferenceOwner
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReferenceCounter, TracingReferenceCounter

    public interface ReferenceCounted
extends ReferenceOwner
    A resource which is reference counted and freed when the refCount drop to 0.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface net.openhft.chronicle.core.ReferenceOwner

        ReferenceOwner.VanillaReferenceOwner

      Returns the reference count for this resource.

    • Method Detail

      • reserve

        void reserve(ReferenceOwner id)
      throws IllegalStateException
        Reserves a resource or throws an Exception.

        Each invocation of this method increases the reference count by one.

        Parameters:
        id - unique id for this reserve
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the resource has already been freed. I.e. its reference counter has as some point reached zero.

      • reserveTransfer

        default void reserveTransfer(ReferenceOwner from,
                             ReferenceOwner to)
                      throws IllegalStateException
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException

      • tryReserve

        boolean tryReserve(ReferenceOwner id)
            throws IllegalStateException
        Tries to reserve a resource and returns if the resource could be successfully reserved.

        Each invocation of this method increases the reference count by one.

        Parameters:
        id - unique id for this reserve
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the resource has already been freed. I.e. its reference counter has as some point reached zero.

      • release

        void release(ReferenceOwner id)
      throws IllegalStateException
        Releases a resource.

        Each invocation of this method decreases the reference count by one.

        Parameters:
        id - unique id for the reserve to be released
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the resource has already been freed. I.e. its reference counter has as some point reached zero.

      • releaseLast

        void releaseLast(ReferenceOwner id)
          throws IllegalStateException
        Releases a resource and checks this is the last usage.

        Each invocation of this method decreases the reference count by one.

        Parameters:
        id - unique id for the reserve to be released
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the resource has already been freed. I.e. its reference counter has as some point reached zero.

      • releaseLast

        default void releaseLast()
                  throws IllegalStateException
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException
